2-layer model graphsage + lstm
Betty without re-partition
Number of batches < 9, OOM ;
Number of batches >= 9, break OOM; 

num of batch || total nodes for computation/pure train time
9, 990842.0639258504
10, 1098851.4413051982
16, 1119648.526223139
17, 1156783.6110290925
18, 1205750.2077500315
19, 1259683.4901476405
20, 1189274.8489610935
32, 1068943.0960997192
64, 785050.1743751626


when number of batches =19, the largest computation efficiency.


x = [9, 10, 16, 17, 18, 19, 20, 32, 64]
y=[990842.0639258504, 1098851.4413051982, 1119648.526223139, 1156783.6110290925, 1205750.2077500315, 1259683.4901476405,1189274.8489610935
     1068943.0960997192,  785050.1743751626]
plt.plot(x, y)
plt.show()
